
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/19038600" title="发布于 2025-08-15 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">精选 5 款 .NET 开源、功能强大的工作流系统，告别重复造轮子！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>最近有不少小伙伴在<strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247515538&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=8d84a40d0f404bcfc6fb6859a2566312&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">DotNetGuide技术社区微信交流群</span></a></span></strong>里问：<code><span>.NET 有哪些好用的工作流系统或者引擎推荐的？</span></code><span>今天大姚给大家推荐 5 款 .NET 开源、功能强大的工作流系统，告别重复造轮子！</span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>OpenAuth.Net</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>OpenAuth.Net 是一个基于 .NET 开源免费（Apache-2.0 License）的权限管理及快速开发框架，.NET 开源最好用的权限工作流系统。它源于 Martin Fowler 的企业级应用开发思想，并结合了最新的技术组合，如&nbsp;<code><span>SqlSugar、EF、Quartz、AutoFac、WebAPI、Swagger、Mock、NUnit、Vue2/3、Element-ui/plus、IdentityServer</span></code><span>&nbsp;等。该项目架构易于扩展，文档齐全且免费，特别适合中小企业使用。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/dotnetchina/OpenAuth.Net" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/dotnetchina/OpenAuth.Net</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247515220&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=2a0bb2c950d1e4ea281faca72a3cbd01&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/D3wIFkNvFq-Z9LWOA6HSZA</span></a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213536050-111881631.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213541581-836775441.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213547217-494479147.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>CCFlow</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>CCFlow 是一款基于 .NET 开源（GPL-3.0开源协议）、配置灵活、功能强大，适合中国国情的工作流引擎，集成方式简洁，容易实现插件模式的开发。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>开源地址：</strong>&nbsp;<strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/opencc/ccflow" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/opencc/ccflow</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247511778&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=0a5bc8b5785ee70a365427499c337e6d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/9VOSiLd5TCjtayumOdTYTg</span></a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213619297-1588905576.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213626953-42189832.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213632162-1657156307.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AntFlow.NET</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AntFlow.NET 是一款基于 .NET + Vue + FreeSql + Natasha 编写的仿钉钉的开源（Apache-2.0）低代码工作流引擎，支持多种数据库，让工作流开发像普通 CURD 一样简单，即使没有流程开发经验的程序员也能快速开发流程，效率提升利器。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>开源地址：</strong>&nbsp;<strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/antswarm/antflowcore" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/antswarm/antflowcore</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247515877&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=74cdc6b9de6e421ab28919e87f1b11bf&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/K_LhxrveXVVNATN45YbArw</span></a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213724811-17851817.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213703897-1977102792.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213709647-1518687585.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>elsa-core</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>elsa-core是一个.NET开源、免费（MIT License）、功能强大且灵活的工作流引擎和设计器，适用于构建各种类型的工作流应用。提供了一组功能强大且灵活的工具和组件，用于定义、运行和监控工作流。它支持多种工作流模型、活动节点、并行执行、条件分支、定时触发等特性，使得开发人员能够根据业务需要构建复杂的工作流程。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>开源地址：</strong>&nbsp;<strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/elsa-workflows/elsa-core" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/elsa-workflows/elsa-core</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247507190&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=33ac95b21deb373c8f85a816aec34588&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/B6nJCwfkclfp1u_0fg0p4Q</span></a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213756409-1654922538.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213801255-1934711800.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213805881-177867884.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Platform</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Platform 是一套基于 .NET + Ant Design Vue 开源（MIT License）、免费的低代码、权限、工作流、动态接口平台。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>开源地址：</strong>&nbsp;<strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/Jesai/platform" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/Jesai/platform</span></a></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247514706&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=45816ccbf6a3f734886269956059d759&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Tg_iC3dNBM8mtxJRT_-CWQ</span></a></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213831410-1370499417.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213835475-710096066.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250814213841440-1871160193.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>本文所有项目都已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。假如你有更好的推荐，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（<strong>让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没</strong><span>🤞）。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
<li>Gitee开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
